statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_cost FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE partner_id = 2;
SELECT influencer_id, partner_id, campaign_start_date FROM influencer_partnerships ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT partner_id FROM influencer_partnerships;
SELECT * FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE campaign_cost < 500.00;
SELECT * FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE influencer_id = 1 AND partner_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE campaign_cost > 500;
SELECT influencer_id, partner_id, SUM(campaign_cost) AS total_cost FROM influencer_partnerships GROUP BY influencer_id, partner_id;
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(campaign_cost) AS avg_cost FROM influencer_partnerships GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING avg_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE campaign_results LIKE '%success%';
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY followers_count DESC, engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, influencer_name FROM Campaigns LEFT JOIN Influencers ON Campaigns.influencer_id = Influencers.influencer_id WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 5000 AND engagement_rate < 3.0 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate, collaboration_date FROM Influencers JOIN Collaborations ON Influencers.influencer_id = Collaborations.influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE marketing_budget > 5000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT brand_name, industry, marketing_budget FROM Brands ORDER BY marketing_budget DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion' ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-06-30';
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT brand_name, marketing_budget FROM Brands WHERE marketing_budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY marketing_budget ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencers WHERE follower_count > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT partnership_id, partnership_date, payment_amount FROM partnership WHERE payment_amount > 500;
SELECT collaboration_type, collaboration_date FROM collaboration ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE follower_count > 1000 ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT partnership_id, partnership_date, payment_amount FROM partnership WHERE payment_amount > 5000;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencers WHERE follower_count < 500 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT partnership_id, partnership_date, payment_amount FROM partnership WHERE partnership_date >= '2021-01-01' AND partnership_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%summer%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
